title: Uno Kudo Vol. 1: Ripped
description: Uno Kudo is a literary and arts publication that features significant new words and art from a diverse array of contributors, presented in expressive and luscious layouts. The theme for this volume is "Ripped" and includes fiction from Richard Cox and Bud Smith, art from Shawna Mouser, photography from Scott Irvine, and a non-fiction piece by Oslo journalist Inga Semmingsen covering the July 2011 Norway attacks.
author: Aaron Dietz
